definitions.text: a gathering of spectators or listeners at a (usually public) performance
examples: someone in the audience began to cough

definitions.text: the part of the general public interested in a source of information or entertainment
examples: the broadcast reached an audience of millions

definitions.text: an opportunity to state your case and be heard
examples: they condemned him without a hearing
he saw that he had lost his audience
he had a consultation with the judge
he requested an audience with the king
